title: Java运行时环境检测到一个致命错误
author: hjw_hjw
txt_content:
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x00007ffa78dc3e80, pid=2840, tid=0x00000000000009fc
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_171-b11) (build 1.8.0_171-b11)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.171-b11 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [msvcrt.dll+0x73e80]
#
# Core dump written. Default location: D:\服务器\hs_err_pid2840.mdmp
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# D:\服务器\hs_err_pid2840.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#

replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
